enhanced_by.reason: The render method relies on the refPointer for resolving schema references, which needs to be initialized beforehand.
The render method clears the handledSchemas set to ensure no stale data is used during rendering.
The render method uses safelyAppend to write to the output stream, ensuring that any I/O exceptions are handled gracefully.
The render method invokes listEndpoints to process and list different types of endpoints (new, missing, deprecated).
The render method invokes listEndpoints to process and list changed operations.
